#summary How to copy and build a gap-data application
#labels copy

 * [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/checkout check out] from [http://subversion.tigris.org/ svn] to your computer

 * [AntBuild create] [http://code.google.com/p/hapax2/wiki/Language?tm=6 Hapax3] templates and [http://java.sun.com/ java] programming [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse objects].

 * [AntBuild test] your application at [http://localhost:8888/ localhost:8888]

 * edit [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/project.application project.application] with the name of your [http://appengine.google.com/ appengine] service space.

 * [AppCfg upload] your application codebase, as tested, into [http://appengine.google.com/ appengine] with AppCfg.
